txt.en: 'Hello stranger, you must be the [placeholder] of which Galâmka spoke.\n\n'I am Gûzinir, and if you are willing, I have a request for you. If you find yourself near Ashâgir to the west, could I ask of you to search around the hideout there to see if anyone remains? I fled when the Orcs arrived and found myself here, but my friends may still be there and may be in need of your help.'
You found the refugees who remained in Ashâgir. Ask one of them if the are in need of help.
Speak with a nearby Ashâgir refugee
Gûzinir asked you to go to Ashâgir and see if there is anyone there in need of help.

'Hello [placeholder], what brings you here?'

You explain to them that you were sent by Gûzinir.

'I see. We remained because we know what to expect here and wanted to rebuild. We did not wish to risk new dangers elsewhere. Though I am glad to hear that they are well.'
Reach the Ashâgir hideout in the cliffs
Gûzinir has asked you to go to Ashâgir and see if there are any refugees remaining there as they may be in need of help.
